mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPw}, TO_DATE(#{userBirth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{userName}, #{userPhone}, 'ust01', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'usa01', '이미지 경로')
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_PW AS userPw, USER_BIRTH AS userBirth, USER_NAME AS userName, USER_PHONE AS userPhone, USERSTAT_CODE AS userstatCode, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, USERAUTH_CODE AS userauthCode, USER_IMAGE AS userImage FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}
